page.title: 03BODIAM STATION
page.content: There has been a station on this site since{Victorian}times, and the track has been used to transport{hops from Robertsbridge; and{flour}, as well as local people to Tenterden. However, during recent years, the station and its{steam}trains have seen little use - though there is hope for the future! Local enthusiasts have been hard at work{restoring}the station to its former glory with a view to running weekend and Bank Holiday steam trips to Tenterden and back. This would take advantage of the close proximity of the already popular Bodiam Castle as a tourist attraction. The station's oldest{engine}, the "Bodiam Shunter", is sited at the station.
